title: WhatsApp could finally let new group members see past messages on iPhone: here's how it works
snippet: WhatsApp is testing a new feature that allows current group members to share chat history with new members, providing context from previous conversations. This feature, available in the latest iOS update, enables sharing up to 100 messages from the last 14 days, though it's off by default.

snippet: Intel stock was falling as it faces headwinds from soaring memory-chip prices, which could hit other companies such as Apple.

title: Forza Horizon 6 brings 550 cars to its largest open world yet: Release date, pre-order benefits and more
snippet: Forza Horizon 6 will be released on May 19, 2026, featuring Japan's landscapes. Players start as tourists and gain rewards as they progress in the game. The game boasts the largest map in the series, new housing features, and will launch with 550 cars.

title: Motorola Signature launched in India: Price, specs, and the 5 key features to know
snippet: Motorola has launched its first candybar flagship, the Motorola Signature with the Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 chipset, and DXOMARK Gold Label certification. It offers a 6.8-inch AMOLED display, triple 50MP camera setup, and a 5,200mAh battery.&nbsp;

title: Motorola Signature Launch Live updates: Motorola Signature with Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 SoC launched
snippet: Motorola Signature Launch Live updates: Motorola Signature will come with the Snadragon 8 Gen 5 processor and a triple 50MP camera setup.

title: Google Pixel bug may be broadcasting your private audio to callers: here's how to protect yourself
snippet: Google's 'Take a Message' feature is causing issues for Pixel users as it reportedly leaks audio to callers. Various devices, from Pixel 4a to Pixel 10, have experienced this bug, prompting users to disable the feature until a fix is provided.

title: Google's AI Mode can now dig through your Photos and Gmail to give more personalized answers
snippet: Google's AI Mode now includes Personal Intelligence which allows users to get tailored search results by connecting to Gmail and Google Photos. The feature is currently only available to Google's paid subscribers in the US.

snippet: US-based enterprise AI software firm Supervity AI on Friday announced signing an agreement with the Maharashtra government to establish the world's first AI GCC hub in Mumbai.

title: Senator says Congress must investigate TikTok deal, faults lack of details
snippet: Democratic ​Senator Ed Markey said on Friday Congress should investigate a ⁠deal by TikTok's Chinese owner ByteDance to establish a majority American-owned joint venture that would secure US data in a bid to avoid a US ban on the social media app.

title: Everyone wants AI sovereignty. No one can truly have it.
